text: Arrā ni tsukae nasai. Nanimono o mo kare ni heichi shite wa naranai. Fubo ni konsetsu o tsukushi, mata kinshin ya minashigo, hinja ya ketsuen no aru rinjin, ketsuen no nai rinjin, michidzure no nakama ya ryokō-sha, oyobi anata gata no migite ga shoyū suru mono (ni Tadashi setsudeare). Arrā wa kōman'na-sha, unuboreru mono o o konomi ni nara renai
